entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve ChildContent RenderFragment completion experience #36634
    Razor.Tooling
  • DateOnly passing to JSRuntime no longer supported in Blazor 6.0.0-rc.1 #36631
  • Not able to trap the LifetimeEventsHostedService on Windows Shutdown or Restart #36630
  • Extract Method support #36624
  • Directive completions seem to disappear with larger completion lists #36623
    17.0-Preview5
  • F12 support for class libraries outside of the project #36622
  • EventCallback type modifications don't re-trigger TagHelper resolution #36621
    17.0-Preview5
  • MSB3277 warnings when referencing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core and System.Security.Cryptography.Cng #36619
  • Surround with (snippets) not available #36616
  • Extract to new component refactoring #36615
  • Default editor colors let TextMate shine through #36614
    17.0-Preview5
  • References not recognizing private fields #36612
  • Startup regression: plaintext #36611
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #36610
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #36609
  • Renaming class name in a code behind of a Razor page should rename the component #36608
  • Refactoring or Code Style to wrap HTML attributes on multiple lines #36607
  • Integration tests in Asp.Net 6 #36606
    6.0-rc2
  • NavigationOption: ScrollAfterNavigation:false => Prevents scroll after navigation #36605
  • Import SCSS file from NuGet package's '_content/<<library>>/' #36604
  • SecurityStampTest.OnValidateIdentityDoesNotExtendExpirationWhenSlidingIsDisabled #36601
    6.0-rc2
  • Return ok from controller before async Task complete #36600
  • RC1 update issue: Blazor don't wait for js interop call and its executed the code synchronous way #36599
    6.0.0
  • TestServer can not resolve route for URI with HTTP encoded parameters #36598
  • Hot reload breaks between compilations #36595
    6.0.0
  • Perf regression: plaintext #36594
  • razor editor cshtml javascript formatting not working in vs2022 preview4 #36592
  • API proposal: ObjectPool IServiceCollection helper extension #36586
  • String-Value of View() is clickable allowing you to jump into the cshtml file #36585
  • Code Analysis to validate views in ASP.NET #36584

Closed

  • Formalized Blazor Wasm Capacitor/Cordova Support #23152
    Backlog
  • NET 6 RC1 Blazor Wasm SignalR WebSockets authentication fails. #36541
  • [Epic] HTTP/3 support in ASP.NET Core #15271
    6.0.0
  • Kestrel hangs #36274
  • role based routing support #36524
  • MVC actions returning Problem Details should return the standard media type for Problem Details responses #36560
    6.0-rc2
  • Minimal APIs should return the standard media type for Problem Details responses #36557
    6.0-rc2
  • Update razor page item template to react to changes with implicit usings, etc. #35073
    6.0.0
  • Blazor Server .NET 6 new project template issues #36572
  • Startup regression: fortunes #36401
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #36567
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #36593
  • RC1: Unable to connect, please ensure WebSockets are available. A VPN or proxy may be blocking the connection. #36596
    6.0.0
  • Add getting started docs for minimal hosting #31992
    6.0-rc2
  • Minimal APIs route constraints break OpenAPI requests #36413
    6.0-rc2
  • Generic Blazor inheritance doesn't compile with the C# 9 Nullable setting enabled #30531
    6.0.0
  • running error "The path must be absolute." #35285
    6.0-rc2
  • dotnet watch hot reload doesn't apply changes to hosted wasm client project #36266
  • Kestrel rejects requests with non standard ASCII characters #36509
  • E2E test retry logic incorrectly tries to keep using same page #34424
    6.0.0
  • Manually verify Blazor E2E tests, including quarantined ones #34949
    6.0.0
  • Re-enable Components E2E tests in release/6.0 branch after GA #35263
    6.0.0
  • Hot Reload for Blazor #5456
    6.0.0
  • Impossible to compile a project targeting net6.0-windows when referencing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing 6.0.0-rc.1.* #36510
    6.0-rc2
  • models list validation return display name #36312
  • Blazor WASM: input checkbox rendering issue #36597
  • Having C# block comments can cause C# colorization to Debug.Fail #33895
    17.0-Preview5
  • Fix Razor Apex Experimental test config #35940
    17.0-Preview4
  • Cannot get HubCallerContext.User to get Set #36421
  • 404 with `_content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements/BlazorCustomElements.js` #36539
    6.0.0
  • NullableAttribute cache causes memory leak #34614
  • 5.0 docs: Kestrel Async ServerOptionsSelectionCallback UseHttps() overload #26243
    6.0.0
  • BlazorWasm - `Clean` after a `Publish` leaves files behind #36546
  • Release notes for packages such as Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.AzureAppServices #36532
  • Avoid invocation of subsequent AuthorizationHandlers for a single Requirement #36536
  • Local SPA Client authentication validation fails with invalid redirect_uri even that they are the same (only with Application Gateway proxy) #36591
  • JSON Patch - remove operation by index appears to throw JsonPatchException (... is out of bounds of the array size) despite not appearing to be out of bounds #36089
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: plaintext #36435
  • Support BindAsync() without ParameterInfo for Minimal APIs #36415
    6.0-rc2
  • New Razor Editor randomly hangs and freezes #33149
    Razor.Tooling
  • OpenAPI documentation is incorrect when using custom TryParse() binding with Minimal APIs #36412
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor wasm: dotnet watch hot reload 100% CPU on Ubuntu #33471
    6.0.0
  • Razor compilation errors started happening from VS2019 v16.10, potentially due to path lengths #33585
  • Untrusted localhost certificate used by Visual Studio to debug Blazor prevents WASM Debugging #35618
  • In most cases, the site can be started up during production. Occasionally, an error of 500.30 will be reported when the site is started up #35647

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36629
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Throw for invalid TryParse and BindAsync #36628
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Handle JsonExceptions in RequestDelegateFactory #36627
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Use a fake clock in the SecurityStampValidator test #36626
    area-identity, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Avoid using invalid content type for ValidationProblemDetails #36618
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Quarantine `OnValidateIdentityDoesNotExtendExpirationWhenSlidingIsDis… #36602
    area-identity
  • Handle JsonExceptions in RequestDelegateFactory #36589
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2

Merged

  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fixup OpenAPI displayed param type when using TryParse #36588
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Add support for BindAsync without ParameterInfo #36590
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #36100
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Revert "New Hosted build pools" #36620
    area-infrastructure
  • Use a fake clock in the test #36625
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid using invalid content type for ValidationProblemDetails #36617
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Revert "New Hosted build pools" #36613
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Fixup feeds #36587
    area-infrastructure
  • Dougbu/check.solution.filters #36449
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Stabilize versions for 6.0.0 RTM #36571
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Add support for BindAsync without ParameterInfo #36505
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update SiteExtension versions #36558
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • [main] Update SiteExtension versions #36565
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fixup OpenAPI displayed param type when using TryParse #36526
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Rename and consolidate "DelegateEndpoint" types #36578
    Servicing-consider, api-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Update http3 RequiresPreviewFeatures attributes with message/URL #36491
    area-runtime
  • Simplify Guid reading/writing code in DataProtection #36403
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/5.0] Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #36559
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Avoid using TargetFramework in build targets #36545
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Add support for BindAsync without ParameterInfo #36580
    area-web-frameworks
  • dotnet-dev-certs: prototype Linux trust support #33279
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, community-contribution
  • Set bootstrap5 for default static assets #36561
    area-identity
  • Fixup OpenAPI displayed param type when using TryParse #36555
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
